japanaye honda samagama saha toyota samagama shri lankawe karmantha aarambha kirima sandaha sakachcha kara athayi jathyanthara welenda katayuthu niyojya amathya sujiwa senasinha mahatha pa්rakasha karayi.

shri lanka nidahas paksha hata thunwana (63) sanwathsarayata samagamiwa sidu kerena wayasa awurudu hatathunak (63) sapiru shri lanka nidahas pakshikayin sandaha nomile jiwitha rakshanayen aawaranaya kirima kalawawa mathiwarana kottasayen arambae.me yatathe pasugiya da (21) kalawawa mathiwarana kottasaye pandahasak (5000) sandaha jiwitha rakshanaya labadenu labuwe dewana palugaswawa akkara pansiyedi abhinawayen aarambha kala kalawawa shri lanka nidahas paksha karyala bhumiyediya.
